snippet: The Senate voted overwhelmingly Wednesday evening 81-18 to approve an a proposal to end a disruptive 16-day government shutdown and extend federal borrowing power to avert a financial default.
abstract: The Senate voted overwhelmingly Wednesday evening 81-18 to approve an a proposal to end a disruptive 16-day government shutdown and extend federal borrowing power to avert a financial default.

byline.original: By JONATHAN WEISMAN and ASHLEY PARKER

headline.main: Senate Passes Measure to End Fiscal Impasse
